mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHUSER(ID, NAME, PWD, AUTH, DEL,ISENT,ENT,ENTNAME,POINT,CERTI) VALUES (#{id},#{name},#{pwd},3, 0,#{isent}, (SELECT ent FROM SHENT WHERE ENTNAME=#{entname}),#{entname} null,null,0,#{certi})
mapper.update: UPDATE SHUSER SET CERTI=1 WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, AUTH,ISENT,ENT,ENTNAME,POINT,CERTI FROM SHUSER WHERE ID = #{id} AND PWD = #{pwd} AND DEL = 0
SELECT nvl(COUNT(*),0) FROM SHUSER WHERE ID=#{id}
SELECT ID, NAME,ENT,ENTNAME,POINT,CERTI FROM SHUSER WHERE ENT=#{ent} AND DEL =0
